Engine Core Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
framework::AppBase class for application instances
framework::App::ConfigurationInitialization parameters
lang::Array< T >Flexible array
gr::BaseTextureBase class for platform dependent textures
io::ByteArrayInputStreamByteArrayInputStream reads bytes from a memory buffer
io::ByteArrayOutputStreamByteArrayOutputStream writes bytes to a memory buffer
hgr::CameraCamera node in scene graph
hgr::Camera::StatisticsScene rendering statistics
lang::CharacterCharacter type information
io::CommandLineParserParses main() command line arguments
hgr::ConsoleUnicode (UTF-8) text rendering console
gr::ContextBase class for platform dependent rendering device contexts
gr::Context::RenderSceneHelper class for exception-safe usage of beginScene and endScene functions
gr::Context::StatisticsRendering context statistics
gr::ContextObjectBase class for rendering context dependent objects
gr::ContextObject::LockHelper class for locking context objects for data access
lang::ConverterCharacter encoding/decoding interface
gr::CubeTextureBase class for platform dependent cube textures
io::DataInputInterface for reading primitive types from the input in portable way
io::DataInputStreamClass for reading primitive types from the input stream in portable way
io::DataOutputInterface for writing primitive types to the output in portable way
io::DataOutputStreamClass for writing primitive types to the output stream in portable way
lang::DebugProvides support for debug output
hgr::DefaultPipeRender scene to rendering target using specified shader technique
hgr::DefaultResourceManagerDefault rendering resource manager
math::DomainDomain specifies distribution for a random variable
hgr::DummyDummy object for storing non-rendering related properties
lang::ExceptionBase class for all exceptions that an application might want to handle
io::FileInputStreamFileInputStream reads bytes from a standard file
io::FileNotFoundExceptionThrown if specified file or path is not found or if the file cannot be opened for some other reason
io::FileOutputStreamFileOutputStream writes bytes to a file in a file system
io::FilterInputStreamFilterInputStream overrides all methods of InputStream with versions that pass all requests to the source input stream
io::FilterOutputStreamFilterOutputStream overrides all methods of OutputStream with versions that pass all requests to the target output stream
io::FindFileFindFile iterates path names in a single directory or recursively in sub-directories
io::FindFile::DataDescription of a file
lang::FloatFloat type information
math::float22-vector of scalar type float
math::float33-vector of scalar type float
math::float3x33x3 column-major matrix of scalar type float
math::float3x43x4 column-major matrix of scalar type float
math::float44-vector of scalar type float
math::float4x44x4 column-major matrix of scalar type float
lang::FormatFormat is a class for constructing messages that keep parameters separately from the formatting string
lang::FormatExceptionException thrown when string formatting error occurs
lang::FormattableContainer for an argument that can be formatted to text
lang::GlobalsGlobals in lang library
hgr::GlobalsGlobals in hgr library
lang::GlobalStorageStorage for global variables
hgr::GlowPipePost-processing glow effect
gr::GraphicsExceptionGraphics library exception
lang::Hash< K >Default hash functor used by Hashtable
lang::Hashtable< K, T, F >Hashtable maps keys to values
lang::HashtableIterator< K, T >Forward iterator of Hashtable elements
io::InputStreamBase class of all input stream classes
lang::IntegerInteger type information
math::InterpolationUtilUtilities for interpolating between key values
math::IntersectionUtilIntersection testing utility functions
io::IOExceptionThrown if input/output operation fails
hgr::KeyframeSequenceKeyframe sequence of flexible format keyframe data
hgr::LightDescribes dynamic light source properties in the scene
hgr::LightSorterHelper class for sorting lights by distance
hgr::LinesLine list
lang::LinkedList< T >Double linked list
lang::LinkedListItem< T >Double linked list item
lua::LuaExceptionThrown if Lua operation fails
lua::LuaObjectBase class for C++ objects which are extended by Lua scripts
lua::LuaStackRestoreHelper class for storing and restoring Lua stack stack top position
lua::LuaStateState of Lua script running environment
lua::LuaTableHandle to Lua table
lang::MathMath contains static methods for performing basic numeric operations
lang::MemoryPoolHandle based memory pool with compact support
hgr::MeshContainer for visual primitives
hgr::NodeBase class for all objects in scene graph
lang::ObjectObject class has functionality for reference counting
ode::ODECollisionInterfaceCalled by simulator to get contacts between objects
ode::ODEDefaultCollisionCheckerCalled by simulator to get contacts between objects
ode::ODEObjectSimple wrapper for ODE collision geometry and simulated rigid body
ode::ODEWorldSimple wrapper which combines ODE simulation world and collision space
lang::OutOfMemoryExceptionThrown if application rans out of memory
io::OutputStreamBase class of all classes writing stream of bytes
gr::PaletteBase class for platform dependent palettes
hgr::ParticleSystemParticle effect
hgr::ParticleSystem::DescriptionDescription of a particle system
io::PathNameClass for manipulating path names
hgr::PipeBase class for different scene rendering techniques
hgr::PipeSetupSetups scene ready for rendering
gr::PrimitiveGeometry primitive list
lang::ProfilePerformance profiling is important part of any game development
io::PropertyParserParses key=value style property pairs from character string
io::PropertyParser::ConstIteratorIterates constant (key,value) property pairs
lang::Ptr< T >Smart pointer to an object of class T
math::quaternionQuaternion of scalar type float
math::RandomUtilUtility functions for pseudo-random number generation inside various domains
gr::RectRectangle with integer 2D coordinates
hgr::ResourceManagerAbstract base class for managing and sharing rendering resources
hgr::SceneRoot node of scene node hierarchy
gr::ShaderSurface shader
gr::Shader::BeginBegins rendering using the shader
gr::Shader::PassBegins rendering specified pass using the shader
lang::StringImmutable Unicode character string
gr::SurfaceFormatDescription of surface pixel bit layout
lang::SystemSystem class provides running environment related information
gr::TextureBase class for platform dependent 2D textures
lang::ThrowableBase class for all exceptions
hgr::TransformAnimationKey frame based affine transformation animation container
hgr::TransformAnimationSetSet of key frame based affine transformations
hgr::UserPropertySetSet of node name based user property strings
lang::UTFConverterUnicode UTF-data encoding/decoding helper class
gr::VertexFormatDescribes vertex bit layout
hgr::VisualBase class for objects to be rendered on screen
